title: Pixel 2 turns on but then immediately off again, won't charge
content: My Pixel 2 has stopped working.  When powering on I get the Google splash screen, then the coloured circles, then a black screen, the same thing over and over again.  I have been through the trouble shooting section(Fix a Pixel phone that won't charge or turn on) I got the battery charging icon left it overnight, still nothing.  I'm now getting the battery with the lightning bolt in the middle icon flashing on and off
